Package it.polimi.ingsw.ClientViewGUI

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractController  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChooseMapController  
    EntryPoint
    This is the Class responsible for loading the GUI.
    LogInController
    This class is responsible for managing the user's interaction with the login screen
    MainGameViewController
    This Class is the GUI for the actual match displaying all the graphical elements
    MenuController
    GUI class for displaying the main menù
    MultiCreateController
    GUI Class for creating a new match for the multiplayer class
    MultiJoinController
    Class for joining to existent matches
    MultiSelectController
    This class is the GUI for managing multiplayer matches
    ObserverGUI
    This Class implements the singleton pattern and contains all the information to recognize the client, and the controller for invoking methods from the server
    PartialMenuController
    This class is the main menù but a lighter version to avoid to reload the background and the top bar
    ResultController  
    WaitInterfaceController
    This is the controller handling the state in which the user is in the waiting room before the match with a limited set of actions
